about_the_game:
"

Portal Packs - Token Essentials: Denizens of the Dark


Art by:  Allen Michael N. Geneta  




Layout by: Anna Michelle  Meservier 


Enter the Portal and travel into darkness!
Denizens of the Dark is another entry in our ongoing & popular series of PC, NPC and Monster tokens.
Breathe life into the dark places of the world with 24 beautifully drawn tokens. Whether you need imagery for a new adventurer, craftsman, or villain we've go you covered. Additionally, each token has eleven color variants so you can find just the right style for your campaign.
As always our tokens are fully compatible with any of our One Minute Maps series.
Enjoy! "
